sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2016, ch. 34, § 1; repealed by Laws 2016, ch. 34, § 2.

Repeals.— Laws 2016, ch. 34, § 2 repealed 41-1A-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2016 ch. 34, § 1, relating to exclusive forum selection and choice of law provisions in health care provider contracts, enforcement, effective July 1, 2019. For provisions of former section,seethe 2018 NMSA 1978 onNMOnesource.com.
